definition: large whalebone whale with long flippers noted for arching or humping its back as it dives
details:
noun
- large whalebone whale with long flippers noted for arching or humping its back as it dives
= synonyms: humpback whale
- a person whose back is hunched because of abnormal curvature of the upper spine
= synonyms: crookback, hunchback
- an abnormal backward curve to the vertebral column
= synonyms: hunchback, kyphosis
